message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You're starting high, I'll try to negotiate from here!
You're trying to negotiate, but I'm not giving up yet! I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not going to give you the better deal.
You're not willing to give up, I'm not willing to give in. Let's try to find a middle ground!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a middle ground. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up yet.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a deal. I'll give you a slight edge, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not impressed with your previous offer. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up my edge.
